Begin TR_m4_Ando_AlchemistsTimer

; Timer script for TR_m4_And_Alchemists_x, targets 6 hours, 1 day, and 1 week

short timerSet
short dayTarget
float hourTarget

if ( MenuMode )
	return
endif

if ( timerSet == 0 )
	Set TR_m4_Ando_AlchemistsTimeCtrl to 0
	Set dayTarget to ( DaysPassed )
	Set hourTarget to ( GameHour + 6 )
	if ( hourTarget >= 24 )
		Set hourTarget to ( hourTarget - 24 )
		Set dayTarget to ( dayTarget + 1 )
	endif
	Set timerSet to 1
	return
endif

if ( dayTarget > DaysPassed )
	return
elseif ( dayTarget == DaysPassed )
	if ( GameHour <= hourTarget )
		return
	endif
endif

if ( TR_m4_Ando_AlchemistsTimeCtrl == 0 )
	Set TR_m4_Ando_AlchemistsTimeCtrl to 1
	Set hourTarget to ( hourTarget + 18 )
	if ( hourTarget >= 24 )
		Set hourTarget to ( hourTarget - 24 )
		Set dayTarget to ( dayTarget + 1 )
	endif
	if ( GetDeadCount "TR_m4_Nevusa_Falen" > 0 )
		Set TR_m4_Ando_HemmetteRumor to 0 ; stop rumour
	endif
	return

elseif ( TR_m4_Ando_AlchemistsTimeCtrl == 1 )
	Set TR_m4_Ando_AlchemistsTimeCtrl to 2
	Set dayTarget to ( dayTarget + 6 )
	if ( GetDeadCount "TR_m4_Hemmette_Fauler" > 0 )
		Set TR_m4_Ando_HemmetteRumor to 0
	else	
		if ( GetDeadCount "TR_m4_Nevusa_Falen" == 0 )
			if ( GetJournalIndex "TR_m4_And_Alchemists_3" < 30 )
				Journal "TR_m4_And_Alchemists_3" 30
			elseif ( GetJournalIndex "TR_m4_And_Alchemists_5" < 100 )
				if ( GetJournalIndex "TR_m4_And_Alchemists_3" < 80 )
					Set TR_m4_Ando_HemmetteRumor to 1 ; start rumour
				endif
				if ( GetJournalIndex "TR_m4_And_Alchemists_3" == 60 )
					Journal "TR_m4_And_Alchemists_3" 80
				elseif ( GetJournalIndex "TR_m4_And_Alchemists_3" == 75 )
					Journal "TR_m4_And_Alchemists_3" 80
				endif
			endif
		endif
		if ( GetJournalIndex "TR_m4_And_Alchemists_3" >= 130 ) ; otherwise stop script now
			return
		endif
	endif

else
	Set TR_m4_Ando_AlchemistsTimeCtrl to 3		
	if ( GetJournalIndex "TR_m4_And_Alchemists_3" < 150 )
		if ( GetJournalIndex "TR_m4_And_Alchemists_1" < 80 )
			Set TR_m4_Ando_HemmetteShopState to 1
			if (  GetJournalIndex "TR_m4_And_Alchemists_3" == 135 )
				Journal "TR_m4_And_Alchemists_3" 140
			endif
		endif
	endif
endif

StopScript "TR_m4_Ando_AlchemistsTimer"

End

Begin TR_m4_Ando_FaulerChestScript

; Script to control the (original) chest in Hemmette Fauler's shop

short chestState
short containsPotion
short OnPCHitMe
short detected
short unlocked
short activated
short journalCheck
short doOnce
short dayCheck

if ( TR_m4_Ando_HemmetteShopState == 1 ) ; upgrades chest
	if ( doOnce == 0 )
		AddItem "p_restore_health_e" 3
		AddItem "p_restore_fatigue_e" 2
		AddItem "p_restore_magicka_e" 2
		Set dayCheck to DaysPassed
		Set doOnce to 1
	elseif ( DayCheck < DaysPassed ) 
		; Resupply. Done this way since it's not possible to set respawnable quantities at runtime.
		; Unfortunately only works if chest has not been emptied before
		RemoveItem "p_restore_health_e" 3
		RemoveItem "p_restore_fatigue_e" 2
		RemoveItem "p_restore_magicka_e" 2
		AddItem "p_restore_health_e" 3
		AddItem "p_restore_fatigue_e" 2
		AddItem "p_restore_magicka_e" 2
		Set dayCheck to DaysPassed
	endif
endif

if ( journalCheck != 0 )
	Set journalCheck to 0
endif
if ( GetJournalIndex "TR_m4_And_Alchemists_1" >= 20 )
	if ( GetJournalIndex "TR_m4_And_Alchemists_3" < 20 )
		if ( GetJournalIndex "TR_m4_And_Alchemists_1" < 60 )
			if ( GetJournalIndex "TR_m4_And_Alchemists_2" < 50 )
				if ( GetJournalIndex "TR_m4_And_Alchemists_6" < 25 )
					if ( GetDeadCount "TR_m4_Nevusa_Falen" == 0 )
						Set journalCheck to 1
					endif
				endif
			endif
		endif
	endif
endif

if ( journalCheck == 0 ) ; behaves like a normal chest outside of quest
	if ( OnActivate )
		Activate
	endif
	return
elseif ( GetLocked == 1 )
	if ( OnActivate )
		Activate
	endif
	if ( unlocked == 1 ) ; in case the player locks the chest
		Set unlocked to 0
	endif
	return
endif

if ( chestState == 1 )
	; check if ANY spoiled potion is in the chest
	if ( GetItemCount "p_drain willpower_q" >= 1 )
		Set containsPotion to 1
	elseif ( GetItemCount "p_drain_luck_q" >= 1 )
		Set containsPotion to 1
	elseif ( GetItemCount "p_drain_strength_q" >= 1 )
		Set containsPotion to 1
	elseif ( GetItemCount "T_Nor_Potion_DrainLuck_Q" >= 1 )
		Set containsPotion to 1
	elseif ( GetItemCount "T_Nor_Potion_DrainStrength_Q" >= 1 )
		Set containsPotion to 1
	elseif ( GetItemCount "T_Nor_Potion_DrainWillpow_Q" >= 1 )
		Set containsPotion to 1
	elseif ( GetItemCount "p_drain_magicka_q" >= 1 )
		Set containsPotion to 1
	elseif ( GetItemCount "p_drain_speed_q" >= 1 )
		Set containsPotion to 1
	elseif ( GetItemCount "T_Nor_Potion_DrainMagicka_Q" >= 1 )
		Set containsPotion to 1
	elseif ( GetItemCount "T_Nor_Potion_DrainSpeed_Q" >= 1 )
		Set containsPotion to 1
	elseif ( GetItemCount "p_drain_intelligence_q" >= 1 )
		Set containsPotion to 1
	elseif ( GetItemCount "p_drain_personality_q" >= 1 )
		Set containsPotion to 1
	elseif ( GetItemCount "T_Nor_Potion_DrainIntelli_Q" >= 1 )
		Set containsPotion to 1
	elseif ( GetItemCount "T_Nor_Potion_DrainPersonality_Q" >= 1 )
		Set containsPotion to 1
	elseif ( GetItemCount "p_drain_agility_q" >= 1 )
		Set containsPotion to 1
	elseif ( GetItemCount "p_drain_endurance_q" >= 1 )
		Set containsPotion to 1
	elseif ( GetItemCount "T_Nor_Potion_DrainAgility_Q" >= 1 )
		Set containsPotion to 1
	elseif ( GetItemCount "T_Nor_Potion_DrainEndurance_Q" >= 1 )
		Set containsPotion to 1
	else
		Set containsPotion to 0
	endif
	
	if ( containsPotion == 1 )
		if ( GetJournalIndex "TR_m4_And_Alchemists_1" < 40 )
			Journal "TR_m4_And_Alchemists_1" 40
		endif
	endif
	Set TR_m4_Ando_NevusaPotionPlaced to containsPotion
endif

if ( MenuMode )
	return
endif

if ( unlocked == 0 ) ; player unlocks chest
	if ( GetDetected Player )
		Set TR_m4_Hemmette_Fauler.controlQ to 1
		TR_m4_Hemmette_Fauler->ForceGreeting
	endif
	Set unlocked to 1
	return
endif

if ( activated == 1 ) ; wait one frame to make sure detection is carried out
	Set activated to 0
	if ( detected == 0 )
		Activate
		if ( chestState == 0 )
			Set chestState to 1
		endif
	endif
	Set detected to 0
	return
endif

if ( OnActivate )
	Set activated to 1
	if ( GetDetected Player )
		Set TR_m4_Hemmette_Fauler.controlQ to 1
		TR_m4_Hemmette_Fauler->ForceGreeting
		Set detected to 1
	endif
endif

End

Begin TR_m4_Ando_FaulerDoorNoteScript

; Script making sure that the note on Hemmette's door is correctly disabled

short OnPCAdd

if ( MenuMode )
	return
endif

if ( OnPCAdd == 1 ) ; don't disable if picked up once
	return
endif

if ( TR_m4_Ando_HemmettePrison == 2 )
	if ( GetDisabled )
		Enable
	endif
elseif ( GetDisabled == 0 )
	Disable
endif

End

Begin TR_m4_Ando_HemmettePrisonSc

; Global script for handling the stages after Hemmette has been jailed

short doOnce
short dayTarget
float hourTarget
short frameHour ; timestamp of previous frame
short moveToPrison

if ( MenuMode )
	return
endif

if ( TR_m4_Ando_HemmettePrison > 0 )
	if ( dayTarget > DaysPassed )
		return
	elseif ( dayTarget == DaysPassed )
		if ( GameHour <= hourTarget )
			return
		endif
	endif
endif

if ( doOnce == 0 )
	Set frameHour to GameHour
	Set dayTarget to ( DaysPassed + 1 )
	Set hourTarget to GameHour
	Set doOnce to 1
	return
endif

if ( TR_m4_Ando_HemmettePrison == 0 )
	; Moving Hemmette to prison
	if ( CellChanged )
		Set moveToPrison to 1
	elseif ( GameHour >= ( frameHour + 1 ) ) ; player rested
		Set moveToPrison to 1
	elseif ( GameHour < frameHour )
		if ( GameHour >= ( frameHour - 23 ) )
			Set moveToPrison to 1
		endif
	endif

	Set frameHour to GameHour

	if ( moveToPrison == 0 )
		return
	endif
	Set TR_m4_Ando_HemmettePrison to 1
	TR_m4_Hemmette_Fauler->PositionCell 3666 4013 17805 5400 "Andothren, Imperial Commission: Garrison"
	TR_m4_Hemmette_Fauler->AddSpell "TR_m4_Ando_IncreasePrice"
	TR_m4_Hemmette_Fauler->AIWander 0 50 0 0 60 20 10 0 0 0 0 0
	TR_m4_Ando_FaulerDoor->Lock 50
	return
endif

if ( TR_m4_Ando_HemmettePrison == 1 )
	; Activates rumours + puts note on door
	Set dayTarget to ( dayTarget + 29 )
	Set TR_m4_Ando_HemmettePrison to 2
	return
endif

; Makes Hemmette return to her shop
Set TR_m4_Ando_HemmettePrison to 3
TR_m4_Hemmette_Fauler->PositionCell 3704 4664 14982 1200 "Andothren, Fauler's Philters"
TR_m4_Hemmette_Fauler->AIWander 0 50 0 0 60 20 10 0 0 0 0 0
TR_m4_Ando_FaulerDoor->Unlock

StopScript "TR_m4_Ando_HemmettePrisonSc"

End

Begin TR_m4_Ando_NevusaBarrelScript

; Script checking the content of the barrel outside Nevusa's shop

if ( GetJournalIndex "TR_m4_And_Alchemists_3" < 70 )
	return
elseif ( GetJournalIndex "TR_m4_And_Alchemists_3" >= 95 )
	return
elseif ( TR_m4_Ando_NevusaLetterState == 0 ) ; supposed to be in desk
	return
elseif ( GetJournalIndex "TR_m4_And_Alchemists_4" >= 50 )
	return
elseif ( GetJournalIndex "TR_m4_And_Alchemists_5" >= 100 )
	return
endif

if ( GetItemCount "TR_m4_Ando_NevusaLetter" < 1 ) ; reset to 0 if removed
	Set TR_m4_Ando_NevusaDeskState to 0
elseif ( GetItemCount "Gold_001" < 400 )
	Set TR_m4_Ando_NevusaDeskState to 0
elseif ( GetItemCount "Gold_001" > 440 ) ; 10% tolerance
	Set TR_m4_Ando_NevusaDeskState to 0
else
	Set TR_m4_Ando_NevusaDeskState to 1
	if ( GetJournalIndex "TR_m4_And_Alchemists_3" < 75 )
		if ( TR_m4_Ando_AlchemistsTimeCtrl < 2 ) ; less than one day passed
			Journal "TR_m4_And_Alchemists_3" 75
		else
			Journal "TR_m4_And_Alchemists_3" 76
		endif
	endif
endif

End

Begin TR_m4_Ando_NevusaDeskScript

; Script controlling Nevusa's desk

float timer
short activated
short detected
short journalCheck

if ( journalCheck != 0 )
	Set journalCheck to 0
endif

if ( GetJournalIndex "TR_m4_And_Alchemists_3" >= 40 )
	if ( GetJournalIndex "TR_m4_And_Alchemists_3" < 95 )
		if ( GetJournalIndex "TR_m4_And_Alchemists_4" < 50 )
			if ( GetJournalIndex "TR_m4_And_Alchemists_5" < 100 )
				if ( GetJournalIndex "TR_m4_And_Alchemists_1" < 80 )
					if ( TR_m4_Ando_NevusaLetterState == 0 )
						Set journalCheck to 1
					endif
				endif
			endif
		endif
	endif
endif

if ( journalCheck == 0 ) ; behaves like a normal desk outside of quest
	if ( OnActivate )
		Activate
	endif
	if ( GetJournalIndex "TR_m4_And_Alchemists_3" != 95 ) ; desk state check should still be active
		return
	endif
endif

if ( GetItemCount "TR_m4_Ando_NevusaLetter" >= 1 )
	Set TR_m4_Ando_NevusaDeskState to 1
	if ( GetJournalIndex "TR_m4_And_Alchemists_3" < 60 )
		if ( TR_m4_Ando_AlchemistsTimeCtrl < 2 ) ; less than one day passed
			Journal "TR_m4_And_Alchemists_3" 60
		else
			Journal "TR_m4_And_Alchemists_3" 61
		endif
	endif
else
	Set TR_m4_Ando_NevusaDeskState to 0
endif

if ( GetJournalIndex "TR_m4_And_Alchemists_3" == 95 )
	return
endif

if ( MenuMode )
	return
endif

if ( activated == 1 ) ; wait one frame to make sure detection is carried out
	Set activated to 0
	if ( detected == 0 )
		Activate
		return
	endif
	Set detected to 0
	return
endif

if ( OnActivate )
	Set activated to 1
	if ( GetDetected Player )
		Set TR_m4_Nevusa_Falen.controlF to 1
		TR_m4_Nevusa_Falen->ForceGreeting
		Set detected to 1
	endif
endif

End

Begin TR_m4_Ando_TilaraInvest

; Script controlling Tilara's investigation and eventual arrest of Nevusa

float initTime
float timer
short initDay
float timePassed
float frameHour ; time stamp of previous frame
short sceneState
short done
short init
short deathCheck

if ( MenuMode )
	return
endif

if ( sceneState == 0 )
	Set initTime to GameHour
	Set initDay to DaysPassed
	FadeOut 1
	TR_m4_Tilara_Danar->PlaySound3D "Door Heavy Open"
	TR_m4_Tilara_Danar->PositionCell 4061 4234 15439 0 "Andothren, Nevusa Falen: Alchemist"
	FadeIn 1
	TR_m4_Ando_NevusaDoor->Unlock
	if ( TR_m4_Ando_NevusaLetterState == 0 )
		if ( TR_m4_Nevusa_Falen.letterFound == 1 )
			TR_m4_Ando_NevusaDesk->RemoveItem "TR_m4_Ando_NevusaLetter" 1
			Set TR_m4_Ando_NevusaDeskState to 0
		endif
		Set sceneState to 2
		Set TR_m4_Ando_InvestigationState to 1 ; investigation ongoing
	else
		Set TR_m4_Nevusa_Falen.letterFound to 0 ; in case she has caught the player in the desk
		TR_m4_Ando_NevusaBarrel->RemoveItem "TR_m4_Ando_NevusaLetter" 1
		; Store the amount of gold in the chest
		Set TR_m4_Ando_NevusaBarrelGold to ( TR_m4_Ando_NevusaBarrel->GetItemCount "Gold_001" )
		Set TR_m4_Ando_NevusaBounty to ( 2000 - TR_m4_Ando_NevusaBarrelGold )
		TR_m4_Ando_NevusaBarrel->RemoveItem "Gold_001" -1
		Set sceneState to 7
		Set TR_m4_Ando_InvestigationState to 2 ; arrest ongoing
	endif
	return
endif

if ( sceneState == 10 )
	; Investigation done
	if ( GetPCCell "Andothren, Eastern Guard Tower South" == 1 )
		; Wait until player rests if staying here
		if ( GameHour >= ( frameHour + 1 ) )
			Set done to 1
		elseif ( GameHour < frameHour )
			if ( GameHour >= ( frameHour - 23 ) )
				Set done to 1			
			endif
		endif
		Set frameHour to GameHour
		if ( done == 0 )
			return
		endif
	endif
	if ( GetPCCell "Andothren, Nevusa Falen: Alchemist" == 1 )
		TR_m4_Tilara_Danar->PlaySound3D "Door Heavy Open"
	endif
	if ( TR_m4_Ando_NevusaDesk->GetItemCount "TR_m4_Ando_NevusaLetter" > 0 )
		TR_m4_Ando_NevusaDesk->RemoveItem "TR_m4_Ando_NevusaLetter" 1
	elseif ( TR_m4_Ando_NevusaLetterState == 0 )
		if ( TR_m4_Nevusa_Falen.letterFound == 0 )
			if ( TR_m4_Nevusa_Falen.arrestScene == 0 )
				Set TR_m4_Nevusa_Falen.letterFound to -1 ; in case player has removed it, important for Nevusa's dialogue
			endif
		endif
	endif
	TR_m4_Tilara_Danar->PositionCell 4403 3963 15562 16260 "Andothren, Eastern Guard Tower South"
	TR_m4_Tilara_Danar->AIWander 0 5 0 0 60 20 10 0 0 0 0 0
	TR_m4_Tilara_Danar->SetHello 30
	Set TR_m4_Ando_InvestigationState to 4
	Set sceneState to 11
endif

if ( sceneState == 11 )
	if ( GetPCCell "Andothren, Nevusa Falen: Alchemist" == 1 )
		; Make sure the player rests or leaves cell before locking door
		if ( GameHour >= ( frameHour + 1 ) )
			Set done to 1
		elseif ( GameHour < frameHour )
			if ( GameHour >= ( frameHour - 23 ) )
				Set done to 1			
			endif
		endif
		Set frameHour to GameHour
		if ( done == 0 )
			return
		endif
	endif
	TR_m4_Ando_NevusaDoor->Lock 50
	StopScript "TR_m4_Ando_TilaraInvest"
	return
endif

Set timePassed to ( GameHour - initTime )
if ( DaysPassed > initDay )
	Set timePassed to ( timePassed + 24 )
endif

if ( GetPCCell "Andothren, Nevusa Falen: Alchemist" == 0 )
	; Check if investigation finishes while player is not in Nevusa's shop
	if ( TR_m4_Ando_NevusaLetterState == 1 ) ; letter in stash
		if ( sceneState == 7 )
			if ( timePassed > 2 )
				Set TR_m4_Ando_InvestigationState to 4
			endif
		endif
	else ; letter in desk
		if ( sceneState == 2 )
			if ( timePassed > 4 )
				Set TR_m4_Ando_InvestigationState to 4
			endif
		endif
	endif
	if ( GetJournalIndex "TR_m4_And_Alchemists_4" >= 50 ) ; Nevusa murdered
		Set TR_m4_Ando_InvestigationState to 4
	endif
	if ( TR_m4_Ando_InvestigationState == 4 )
		Set frameHour to GameHour
		Set sceneState to 10
		if ( TR_m4_Ando_NevusaLetterState == 0 )
			if ( TR_m4_Ando_NevusaDesk->GetItemCount "TR_m4_Ando_NevusaLetter" < 1 )
				; Arrest failed
				Set TR_m4_Ando_NevusaDeskState to 0
			endif
		endif
	endif
	return
endif

if (sceneState > 2 )
	if ( sceneState < 7 )
		if ( CellChanged )
			Set sceneState to 7
		elseif ( GameHour >= ( frameHour + 1 ) ) ; player rested
			Set sceneState to 7
		elseif ( GameHour < frameHour )
			if ( GameHour >= ( frameHour - 23 ) )
				Set sceneState to 7
			endif
		endif
	endif
endif

Set frameHour to GameHour

if ( GetJournalIndex "TR_m4_And_Alchemists_4" == 50 ) ; Nevusa murdered
	if ( deathCheck == 0 )
		if ( sceneState < 8 )
			TR_m4_Tilara_Danar->AITravel 3840 4028 15439
			TR_m4_Tilara_Danar->SetHello 0
			Set sceneState to 5 ; walk towards exit
		endif
		Set deathCheck to 1
	endif
endif

if ( sceneState == 2 )
	if ( init == 0 )
		TR_m4_Tilara_Danar->AIActivate "TR_m4_Ando_NevusaDoor"
		Set init to 1
	endif
	if ( CellChanged )
		Set timer to 0
	else
		Set timer to ( timer + GetSecondsPassed )
	endif
	if ( init == 1 )
		if ( ( TR_m4_Ando_NevusaDoor->GetAngle z ) >= 180.01 ) ; make sure door has started to open
			TR_m4_Tilara_Danar->AIWander 600 4 0 30 20 5 25 0 0 0 0 0
			Set init to 2
		endif
	elseif ( init == 2 )
		if ( ( TR_m4_Ando_NevusaDoor->GetAngle z ) < 180.01 ) ; player has closed the door
			Set init to 0
		endif
	endif
	if ( timePassed > 1.5 )
		if ( timer > 20 ) ; wander for at least 20 seconds upon entering
			TR_m4_Tilara_Danar->AITravel 4092 3885 15439
			TR_m4_Tilara_Danar->SetHello 0
			Set SceneState to 3
		endif
	endif
	return
endif

if ( sceneState == 3 )
	; Walking towards desk
	if ( TR_m4_Tilara_Danar->GetAIPackageDone )
		TR_m4_Tilara_Danar->AIActivate "TR_m4_Ando_NevusaDesk"
		Set timer to 0
		Set SceneState to 4
	endif
	return
endif

if ( sceneState == 4 )
	; Checking desk content after 5 seconds
	Set timer to ( timer + GetSecondsPassed )
	if ( timer > 5 )
		Set TR_m4_Ando_InvestigationState to 2
		if ( TR_m4_Ando_NevusaDesk->GetItemCount "TR_m4_Ando_NevusaLetter" == 1 )
			TR_m4_Ando_NevusaDesk->RemoveItem "TR_m4_Ando_NevusaLetter" 1
			TR_m4_Tilara_Danar->Say "Vo\d\f\CrAtk_DF004.mp3" "Ha!"
			TR_m4_Tilara_Danar->AITravel 3840 4028 15439
			Set sceneState to 5
		else
			; No arrest
			if ( TR_m4_Nevusa_Falen.letterFound == 0 ) ; letter removed by player
				Set TR_m4_Nevusa_Falen.letterFound to -1
			endif
			TR_m4_Tilara_Danar->AIWander 600 4 0 30 20 5 25 0 0 0 0 0
			TR_m4_Tilara_Danar->SetHello 30
			Set TR_m4_Tilara_Danar.control to 1
			Set timer to 0
			Set sceneState to 6
		endif
	endif
	return
endif

if ( sceneState == 6 )
	if ( init == 0 )
		TR_m4_Tilara_Danar->AIActivate "TR_m4_Ando_NevusaDoor"
		Set init to 1
	elseif ( init == 1 )
		if ( ( TR_m4_Ando_NevusaDoor->GetAngle z ) >= 180.01 )
			TR_m4_Tilara_Danar->AIWander 600 4 0 30 20 5 25 0 0 0 0 0
			Set init to 2
		endif
	elseif ( init == 2 )
		if ( ( TR_m4_Ando_NevusaDoor->GetAngle z ) < 180.01 )
			Set init to 0
		endif
	endif
	; Wander for another 30 seconds
	Set timer to ( timer + GetSecondsPassed )
	if ( timer > 30 )
		TR_m4_Tilara_Danar->AITravel 3840 4028 15439
		TR_m4_Tilara_Danar->SetHello 0
		Set sceneState to 5
	endif
	return
endif

if ( sceneState == 5 )
	; Walk towards counter
	if ( TR_m4_Tilara_Danar->GetAIPackageDone )
		TR_m4_Tilara_Danar->AIWander 0 5 0 0 60 20 10 0 0 0 0 0 1
		TR_m4_Tilara_Danar->Face 3999 4028
		TR_m4_Tilara_Danar->SetHello 30
		Set sceneState to 8
	endif
	return
endif

if ( sceneState == 8 )
	; Arrest of Nevusa, or ending investigation
	if ( TR_m4_Tilara_Danar->GetAIPackageDone ) ; make sure she looks at Nevusa
		TR_m4_Tilara_Danar->Face 3999 4028
	endif
	Set timer to ( timer + GetSecondsPassed )
	if ( timer < 1 ) ; wait 1 second to avoid abrubt greeting
		return
	endif
	if ( TR_m4_Tilara_Danar->GetDistance Player <= 256 )
		Set TR_m4_Tilara_Danar.controlQ to 1
		TR_m4_Tilara_Danar->ForceGreeting

Begin TR_m4_NPC_FaulerGuard

; Script for disabling Hemmette Fauler's guard and controlling the arrest scene

short TR_Map
short tempEnabled
float initTime
float timer
short initDay
float timePassed
float frameHour ; time stamp of previous frame
short sceneState
short arrestState ; controls the dialogue during the arrest scene
short HemmetteInterrupt ; interrupts player if trying to talk to Hemmette after arrest

if ( MenuMode )
	return
endif

if ( TR_Map != 4 )
	set TR_Map to 4
endif

if ( TR_m4_Ando_HemmetteShopState == 1 )
	if ( TR_m4_Hemmette_Fauler.guardState == 1 )
		if ( GetDisabled )
			Enable
		endif
	endif
	return
endif

if ( GetJournalIndex "TR_m4_And_Alchemists_1" != 50 )
	if ( tempEnabled == 1 )
		if ( CellChanged )
			Set tempEnabled to 0
		elseif ( GameHour >= ( frameHour + 1 ) ) ; player rested
			Set tempEnabled to 0
		elseif ( GameHour < frameHour )
			if ( GameHour >= ( frameHour - 23 ) )
				Set tempEnabled to 0
			endif
		endif
	endif
	if ( tempEnabled == 0 )
		if ( GetDisabled == 0 )
			Disable
		endif
		return
	endif
else

	if ( sceneState == 0 )
		; Initial checks
		Set timePassed to ( GameHour - initTime )
		if ( DaysPassed > initDay )
			Set timePassed to ( timePassed + 24 )
		endif
		if ( CellChanged )
			if ( timePassed <= 3 )
				PositionCell 4153.268 4940.933 15061 10800 "Andothren, Fauler's Philters"
				Set timer to 0
				return
			else ; the guard is waiting for you
				Set sceneState to 2
			endif
		endif
		if ( timePassed < 1 )
			return
		endif
	endif
	
	if ( sceneState == 0 )
		; Initiates arrest scene
		Set timer to ( timer + GetSecondsPassed )
		if ( timer < 5 ) ; don't start scene within 5 seconds upon entering
			return
		elseif ( GetDistance Player <= 64 ) ; don't spawn if player is too close
			return
		endif
		Enable
		Set tempEnabled to 1
		PlaySound3D "Door Heavy Open"
		AITravel 3707 4801 14990
		SetHello 0
		Set sceneState to 1
	elseif ( sceneState == 1 )
		; guard movement
		if ( GetAIPackageDone )
			AIWander 0 5 0 0 60 20 10 10 0 0 0 0 1
			Face 3704 4664
			SetHello 30
			set sceneState to 3
			return
		elseif ( CellChanged )
			Set sceneState to 2
		elseif ( GameHour >= ( frameHour + 1 ) ) ; player rested
			Set sceneState to 2
		elseif ( GameHour < frameHour )
			if ( GameHour >= ( frameHour - 23 ) )
				Set sceneState to 2
			endif
		endif
	elseif ( sceneState == 3 )
		; arrest of Hemmette
		if ( GetAIPackageDone ) ; make sure he looks at Hemmette
			Face 3704 4664
		endif
		if ( TR_m4_Hemmette_Fauler->GetHealth < 1 )
			Set sceneState to 5
			return
		endif
		if ( GetDistance Player <= 256 )
			Set TR_m4_Ando_FaulerChest.chestState to 0 ; prevent this script from looking for potion
			; Various options for triggering Hemmette to search her chest
			if ( TR_m4_Hemmette_Fauler.potionFound == 1 )
				Set arrestState to 1
			elseif ( TR_m4_Hemmette_Fauler.controlF >= 3 )
				Set arrestState to 2
			endif
			ForceGreeting	
			endif
		endif
	endif
	
	if ( sceneState == 2 )
		; teleport guard to final position
		PositionCell 3707 4801 14990 10800 "Andothren, Fauler's Philters"
		Enable
		Set tempEnabled to 1
		AIWander 0 5 0 0 60 20 10 10 0 0 0 0 1
		Face 3704 4664
		set sceneState to 3
	endif
	
endif

Set frameHour to GameHour

if ( sceneState == 4 )
	TR_m4_Ando_FaulerChest->StartScript "TR_m4_Ando_ClearChest"
	Set sceneState to 5
endif

End

Begin TR_m4_NPC_Nevusa_Falen

; Script controlling Nevusa's dialogue states and journal updates on death

short TR_Map
short control ; controls whether the PC has talked about certain topics

short controlF ; toggles force greet

float timer
short arrestScene ; triggers final part of arrest scene

if ( MenuMode )
	return
endif

if ( OnDeath )
	StartScript "TR_m4_Ando_AlchemistsTimer"
	Set TR_m4_Ando_AlchemistsTimer.timerSet to 0
	if ( TR_m4_Ando_InvestigationState == 1 )
		if ( GetDeadCount "TR_m4_Tilara_Danar" == 0 )
			Set TR_m4_Ando_NevusaMurdered to 2

name: Announcement
text:
This establishment is closed until further notice. Its owner has been sentenced to prison for a serious breach in conduct of business, by repeatedly misleading her customers into buying spoiled potions.

Trespassing into this establishment will be considered a crime, until its fate has been decided by the authorities.

Serjo Tholer Andas,
Governor

name: Forged Letter
text:
Dear Nevusa,

The wares we ordered have safely arrived in Menaan. Here's the gold we agreed upon. For your next shipment, we need:

30 bluefoot mushrooms
30 violet coprinus
10 bottles of mazte
10 bottles of shein
10 bottles of sujamma

Return the goods within a month, or face the consequences. We'll pay you 400 gold for it, same as last time.

Yours truly,
R.V.
The Rivaling Alchemists
Nevusa Falen in Andothren asked me to help her frame the other alchemist in town, who she is accusing of stealing her customers despite selling wares of much lower quality than hers.
I've declined to help Nevusa with the scheme.

I've accepted the offer. I'm asked to go to Fauler's Philters and plant a spoiled potion into Hemmette Fauler's supply chest. Afterwards I should tell the guards that she is selling spoiled potions. This is bound to cause problems for Hemmette, since she had an incident with potions that had spoiled when she arrived, which brought the guards' attention. Nevusa promised me a rich reward, but perhaps I should report her to the guards instead?
I was caught when trying to plant the potion into the chest. Nevusa won't be happy about this. But perhaps I could give it another attempt?
Hemmette noticed that I was sneaking into her belongings, but I think my excuse was convincing enough as to not raise suspicion.
I was again caught when trying to plant the potion into the chest. Nevusa won't be happy about this.
I've successfully planted the potion into the chest. Now I should report it to the guards.
I've reported Hemmette to a guard. He asked me to meet up with him inside Fauler's Philters in an hour.
Hemmette had noticed the spoiled potion among her belongings. Without evidence, the guard couldn't arrest her. I should report my failure to Nevusa.
Nevusa was furious when I told her that I'd failed the mission. I think I should keep away from her for a while.
Hemmette was arrested for her supposed trickery. As she couldn't pay up, she will now serve time in jail. I should report my success to Nevusa.
I've killed Hemmette Fauler.
Nevusa was happy about my successful endeavor. She rewarded me with a special amulet and will from now on offer reduced prices in her shop.
While being pleased that she'd got rid of a rival, Nevusa was not very happy with the murder. Nevertheless, she will offer reduced prices in her shop.
The Rivaling Alchemists

I told Tilara Danar, Andothren's guard captain, about Nevusa's planned scheme. She asked me to tell the guard inside Nevusa's shop about the matter. In case he resists, I should command him to report to Tilara afterwards.
I was able to convince the guard in Nevusa's store to arrest her for the attempted fraud.

Nevusa was furious about my deceit. However, she was able to escape justice by bribing the guard. As a token of gratitude, he offered me 50 gold. I think I should keep away from Nevusa's shop for a while.

Nevusa was furious about my deceit. However, she was able to escape justice by bribing the guard. He offered me some gold as a token of gratitude, but I refused it since I don't want to take part in the city's corruption. I think I should keep away from Nevusa's shop for a while.
The Rivaling Alchemists

I've told Hemmette Fauler about Nevusa's plan. She was relieved that I chose to tell her, but did not seem surprised. To stop Nevusa from planning future mischiefs, she asked me if I would help her with revenge.
I've refused Hemmette's offer.
I've refused Hemmette's offer.
I've agreed to help Hemmette with the revenge on Nevusa. She asked me to return in one day, as she needs some time to make up a plan.
One day has passed, so I should return to Hemmette.

Hemmette provided a forged letter which describes a shady interaction between Nevusa Falen and the Camonna Tong. Meanwhile, she has spread a rumor in the city about this business. My task is to plant the letter among Nevusa's belongings, but I need to decide whether I want to place it in her desk, or at the hiding place Hemmette invented along with some gold I'll have to provide myself.
I've decided to put the letter in Nevusa's desk. I should wait one day before returning to Hemmette.
Nevusa caught me when I tried to plant the letter into her desk. I may still ask Hemmette if I can put it at the hiding place instead. Otherwise, I could make another attempt and hope for the best.
I've successfully planted the letter into Nevusa's desk. I should return to Hemmette tomorrow and report my success.
I've successfully planted the letter into Nevusa's desk. Since one day has passed, I should immediately return to Hemmette and report my success.

I've decided to put the letter in the barrel just outside Nevusa's shop. To make the evidence convincing, I need to accompany the letter with 400 gold. Hemmette will return it later. I should wait one day before returning to her.
I've put the letter in the barrel along with the gold. I should return to Hemmette tomorrow and report my success.
I've put the letter in the barrel along with the gold. Since one day has passed, I should immediately return to Hemmette and report my success.
One day has passed, so I should return to Hemmette.

With the evidence planted, and the rumor having had time to spread, Hemmette asked me to report the matter to Andothren's guard captain, Tilara Danar. She is stationed in the south section of the eastern guard towers.
Tilara Danar had heard the rumors, and agreed to start an investigation. She will immediately go to Nevusa Falen's place and look for evidence.

Tilara Danar has arrested Nevusa Falen. Presented with the evidence, Nevusa had no other choice but to pay a hefty bounty. However, she saw through my part in it and will substantially raise her prices should I ever wish to do business with her again. I should return to Hemmette and report my success.
Tilara Danar told me that they had found evidence for Nevusa's crime, and she was punished for her actions. I should return to Hemmette and report my success.

I've visited Nevusa Falen's shop, but the investigation was already done. She furiously told me about the evidence they had found and that she had been charged with a hefty bounty for it. However, she saw through my part in it and will substantially raise her prices should I ever wish to do business with her again. I should return to Hemmette and report my success.

Nevusa Falen had found the forged letter! Without any evidence, Tilara Danar abondoned the investigation. This did not prevent Nevusa from blaming me for my actions, and she will substantially raise her prices should I ever wish to do business with her again. I should return to Hemmette and report my failure.
Tilara Danar told me that no evidence was found, so Nevusa must have found the letter after all! I should return to Hemmette and report my failure.

I've visited Nevusa Falen's shop, but the investigation was already done. She told me that she had found the evidence and the investigation had been abandoned. She also accused me for planting the letter, and will substantially raise her prices should I ever wish to do business with her again. I should return to Hemmette and report my failure.

I've told Hemmette that the scheme had been successful. She was happy and rewarded me with three exclusive potions and will from now on offer reduced prices in her shop. In addition, she expects to improve her stock in a couple of days.

I've told Hemmette that the scheme had been successful. She was happy and rewarded me with three exclusive potions and will from now on offer reduced prices in her shop. In addition, she expects to improve her stock in a couple of days. I should return to her in a week to reclaim the gold she owes me.
One week has passed, so I should return to Hemmette to reclaim my gold.
Hemmette was finally able to pay her debt, along with another 100 gold for the trouble.
Hemmette was disappointed when she learned about my failure. She fears Nevusa will make another attempt on framing her in the near future.
The Rivaling Alchemists
I've killed Nevusa Falen.
While understanding my decision, Hemmette was not very happy that I had killed Nevusa. Nevertheless, she will offer reduced prices in her shop from now on.
I was able to convince Hemmette that I had no part in the murder. Relieved, she will offer reduced prices in her shop from now on.
The Rivaling Alchemists
Since Tilara Danar is dead, Hemmette Fauler won't be able to proceed with her plan.
The Rivaling Alchemists
Nevusa was furious when I told her that I had failed the mission. I think I should keep away from her for a while.
The plan is all set. Are you ready to finally get rid Nevusa Falen?
The plan is not ready yet. I told you to wait a day, didn't I?
Come on. You can't let Nevusa get away without punishment, can you? But okay, take your time.
You disappoint me. I guess I'll have to come up with an idea that doesn't involve you, then.
